topic.title: Are there any search engines?
topic.body:
The one thing I have yet to run across is a search engine for ZeroNet.
If one doesn't exist, maybe we should make one.

1_1ELBjparWRzWWptstDfNtKyY2E5mHtL5J4.body:
WELL CONGRATULATIONS, YOU'VE GOT YOURSELF ONLINE
NOW WHAT'S THE NEXT STEP OF YOUR MASTER PLAN?

2_1AZjDLkfYwSmjM7ZJUf7HHnrF778augRMa.body:
> [kaffie](#comment_187_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh): Trans women are women. Just because you're an idiot doesn't make that not true.
> 
> Lots of cis people have genetic disorders and are not XX nor XY. Chromosomes have little bearing on sex and appearance. Seriously, go fucking learn your shit before you spew crap off like an idiot.
> 
> Being trans is not a mental illness. Though I'd consider people who say stupid shit like the stuff you're saying to be mentally ill.
> 
> Yes, there are cis women here. You don't believe it because you're a sexist transphobic bigot. If you don't like it here, gtfo.

What is gender dysphoria and how does it work?

> [kaffie](#comment_189_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh): ...it's a bit like depression, body dysmorphia, and anxiety all balled up into one.
Are those not mental illnesses?
